title: Bee Keeper Bard
body:
Honey comb = chimes
Bees = meeps
Annoying buzzing sound = replace his music
Honey covered walls = magical journey
Health Shrine = pots of honey
Giant honey comb = his ult
I have a vision, don't you?
#BeeKeeperBard make it your status please, or get it trending.

replies.body:
RITO PLS. 

I'm just picturing Bard in one of those beekeeper hat/veils, and it's amazing. AND HE HAS A BEE SMOKER THAT HE USES FOR HIS (Q). 

!!!

Looks like Carlo Spacone made **BUMBLE BARD** - 

http://i.imgur.com/GnuM0OO.png

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=JNvtaneP,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-03-01T18:50:51.720+0000)
>
> RITO PLS. 
> 
> I'm just picturing Bard in one of those beekeeper hat/veils, and it's amazing. AND HE HAS A BEE SMOKER THAT HE USES FOR HIS (Q). 
> 
> !!!
> 
> Looks like Carlo Spacone made **BUMBLE BARD** - 
> 
> http://i.imgur.com/GnuM0OO.png

pitch it to the skins team pls
I shot an email to the team with this art in it this morning with the title, **BUMBLE BARD!!!** :3

Holy crap you're a god!!! That's amazing thank you so much. I don't know how I could repay you but thanks so much for getting out there I really appreciate it. I honestly think it's amazing that the community has a chance of getting their ideas into their favorite game.

NO U. :D

No need to repay me, it's a sweet idea, and we actually have a collection of player ideas/art that we look at when we're looking at new skins. ^-^

You could release a beekeeper skin line where part of the profits are donated to saving the bees. Think of the bees Rito!

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
I'm so glad that you can see this as well, to me it's such a perfect fit.

I main bard
just do it
I need this in my life.

Sounds cool to me!  Any chance of a guardian of the sands Swain while you're at it?  He could look like the golden bird god Osiris.  Be all like Stargate.

New skin line confirmed?

Only if he's wearing a bee keeper hat thing.
Picturing Bard with one of those just sounds too cute. (If you can call Bard cute)
it supports, it makes music, its fluffy, we can call it cute
I love it. Riot, hear this man!
this skin is the bees knees
Someone suggested Bee Keeper Singed a while ago. Looked pretty funny.
Bee Keeper Singed has been a concept since the dawn of League. Sadly Riot hates free money with good skin concepts.
A pot of honey for his healing shrine!
i love the idea! especially that his chimes would be in the jg and bees would be there too! His ult can be an aoe of honey, hence the cant move!!!!!! Amazing idea!
I think Bard is gonna be the new Teemo, every skin you make for him is gonna sell like gold

My briefcase full of bees should put a stop to this!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PYtXuBN1Hvc&feature=youtu.be&t=54
NOT THE BEES!
Bard is basically the reason I'm still playing after 4 years.  Please make this happen Rito!!

Hey ! How about making his ult covering people up with honey , because his ult makes people stick to the ground, it would be like a big bowl of honey being dropped down by 2 big cute bees or something else

http://thelittleboots.deviantart.com/art/BeeKeeperBard-594074927?ga_submit_new=10%253A1456869772

loved the idea so much
I LOVE IT!!! THAT LOOKS GREAT!
OH BABY!!!! BEEEEEEEEEEEEEZZZ!!!!{{summoner:4}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:4}}

Do this please. Beemo and Beekeeper Singed were both very well done, this would be another in what is a solid line. And some profits going to bee rescue/conservation would be too cool. Bee die we die.
[I DREW A THING HERE](http://www.furaffinity.net/view/21288097/)

The only downside to this is a fear of bees is common and sometimes strong enough to where (me for example) can't even hear the buzz of bees without getting extreme anxiety, which would make the game near unplayable if that skin was in play.
Fear of spiders and snakes are real too, but hasn't stopped Elise and Cassiopia from existing.
bard isnt that popular though it would be pretty rare
thats not the point
I would never accept a Bee champion. But a joke bee skin Champ I could do. But a realistic Bee Champion like Elise, I would always ban it.
Bee Keeper Singed first or even better duo release
Yea if Bee Movie creates a sequel I will kms. Still a good skin tho.
Bard
Stfu lol
fits your name.
